biotools.summary: ADEx: Autoimmune Diseases Explorer is a comprehensive and centralized database for exploring omics data in Autoimmune Diseases. The database that integrates 82 curated transcriptomics and methylation studies covering 5609 samples for some of the most common autoimmune diseases.

bioschemas.name: ADEx: Autoimmune Diseases Explorer
